definition: to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: Urn on the outside, as well as a city, called East Rochester.
sentences.chinese: 甕城的外面，還有一座城，叫做東羅城。

sentences.english: You do not need to pay for hosting or anything else, just for the domain.
sentences.chinese: 你不需要爲做東或者其他事情付錢，只因爲在領域中。

sentences.english: He acted as host to his father's friends.
sentences.chinese: 他做東招待了父親的朋友們。

sentences.english: Tonight she hosts a ball for 300 guests.
sentences.chinese: 今晚她做東舉辦一場有300名客人蔘加的舞會。

sentences.english: He acted as host to my friends.
sentences.chinese: 他做東招待了我的朋友。

sentences.english: The Emmys usually rotate among the four major broadcast networks.
sentences.chinese: 艾美獎有美國四大廣播電視網輪流做東舉辦。

sentences.english: Now remember this is to my treat, so I will pay for everything.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了這次由我做東，一切帳都由我付。

sentences.english: After the meeting I had to properly welcome the director at night and play a good host.
sentences.chinese: 開會之後，晚上我做東爲導演洗塵，一盡地主之誼。
